data.text: @smbrnsn Thanks for my new useful phrase of the week, Sam.  “Sanitation Theater” is a winner!

@LRGF35 Totally fair.

But we need to stop connecting it to Covid. Because people wash their hands (or, at least, they say they do) and figure that's enough to prevent an airborne disease.
@smbrnsn But seriously, the majority of people still don’t wash their hands enough. Prevention of GI illnesses is a huge motivator for me.
@smbrnsn At my university they just got rid of the signs that warn you not to put your cellphone on the counter by the sink like a month or two ago.
@smbrnsn Same - I have no idea when I will go back to eating in restaurants but it won’t be anytime soon.
FWIW, we haven't eaten indoors at a restaurant in 2 years and don't foresee returning in the near future. It would be nice and all, but our family's health is more important.
